articles.title: Canada probes Nike, Dynasty Gold over alleged use of Uyghur forced labour - BBC
articles.description: Its ethics watchdog is also investigating a gold company over use of forced labour in China operations.
articles.content:
Canada's ethics watchdog has launched investigations into allegations that Nike Canada and a gold mining company benefitted from Uyghur forced labour in their China operations.
